fr.irit.smac.amak.ui

Class DrawableUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.irit.smac.amak.ui.DrawableUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Schedulable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AntViewer

    public abstract class DrawableUI
extends java.lang.Object
implements Schedulable
    This class should be overridden by classes aiming at rendering stuffs on a canvas
    Author:
    Alexandre Perles

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int defaultSleep
      set fps to 10 to avoid CPU overload
